name: World Of Nothing
description:
For the Ludum Dare 45, made in 74 hours.

You are in Nothing! An empty world, where things become nothing, but darkness..

As the only thing alive in Nothing, your mission is to bring life to this world, build and create stuff around you to bring life to this world.

But be careful.. As the nobody will try to eat the life you created! PROTECT YOURSELF!

_________________________________________

-HOW TO PLAY-

-Click yourself to create Flow, flow are the points you use to buy elements in the game.

-The monsters live in the darkness, the flowers bring light and flow the more flowers, the more flow and less monsters will spawn.

-Your objective is to invoke the final boss with 3 magic rubies, defeat him and you will win "or you can buy Cup of Victory".

-Towers will defend you from the monsters, clicking enemies will hurt them, is easier if you use towers and explosives to deal with them "also putting tons of flowers".
